siteInfo.name: The Browz Threading
siteInfo.description: The Browz Threading is a full service threading salon dedicated to ensuring that clients look and feel their best. Choose from a range of threading services and makeup for special occasions or as part of a regular beauty regimen.

heroSection.title: Natural Beauty
heroSection.subtitle: Beautifully shaped eyebrows by experienced threading specialists.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.content: The Browz Threading is a well-known, community‑appreciated threading salon with years of experience. Our specialists are committed to delivering beautifully shaped eyebrows and exceptional customer service. Taking care of your eyebrows and skin is essential to your wellbeing, and we help you look and feel your best.

services.name: Eyebrow Threading
services.description: Removing unwanted hair and giving a nice shape.

services.name: Upper Lip Threading
services.description: Removing unwanted hair from the upper lip.
